laazotea.indi.server

Class DefaultINDIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.server.AbstractINDIServer
      • laazotea.indi.server.DefaultINDIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    INDIBasicServer, MinimumINDIServer

    public class DefaultINDIServer
extends AbstractINDIServer
    A class representing a default implementation of an INDI Server. It implements all the abstract methods of AbstractINDIServer to allow any client that connects to access any device that the Server loads. New Servers that do not implement specific restrictions may extend this class instead of the AbstractINDIServer.
    Version:
    1.31, April 12, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
    See Also:
    AbstractINDIServer
